column1: Diamante is a city in the west of the province of Entre Ríos
column3: on the eastern shore of the Paraná River. It has about 20
column4: 000 inhabitants as per the 2010 census [INDEC]. It is the head town of the Diamante Department.

column1: The town of Diamante was founded on 27 February 1836
column2: and became a first-class municipality on 13 May 1872.

column1: Municipal information: Municipal Affairs Federal Institute (IFAM)
